item.title: Using abstraction as a framework for discussions
item.description: As a Solution Architect, I often find myself in discussions with two kinds of audiences: The Engineer Here, I refer to those that wants to ‘see the matrix’ to a certain depth, (i.e. how the sausage is made somewhere between assembly language to GUI). The Executive This is from the endearing term 'Executive Summary'. Here, it is less about ‘the matrix’ but how they can leverage a certain resource to maximize a certain other resource (i.
